original_text: Who provideth for the raven his food? when his young ones cry unto God, they wander for lack of meat.
korean_text: 까마귀 새끼가 하나님을 향하여 부르짖으며 먹을 것이 없어서 허우적거릴 때에 그것을 위하여 먹이를 마련하는 이가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: Who provideth for the raven his food?
When his young ones cry unto God,
they wander for lack of meat.
